title: 180. Gavin Aung Than: Super Sidekicks Book 3 Trial of Heroes
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: Catch cartoonist and the creative brain behind Zen Pencils GAVIN AUNG THAN as co-hosts Dani Vee & Adrian Beck grill him about his process, why he writes and his favourite childhood cartoons. Dani puts Gav and Adrian to the test with their own Trial of Heroes test. Who will come out on top?

description: Catch cartoonist and the creative brain behind Zen Pencils GAVIN AUNG THAN as co-hosts Dani Vee & Adrian Beck grill him about his process, why he writes and his favourite childhood cartoons. Dani puts Gav and Adrian to the test with their own Trial of Heroes test. Who will come out on top?
